extendedInfo.description: Crosses a thousand kilometres up to coming to the goal in Distant City.In the first stage will have to be careful with oncoming traffic and multiple bridges to save the rivers that crosses the road.The second stage is a highway where you can relax a bit before entering the mountain stage where an icy road can make it difficult to maintain control of the car.In the fourth stage will drive at night, visibility will be reduced. Some drivers report seeing a UFO in this area.Finally you'll have with the demoniac Distant City traffic before reaching the goal.You get an extra life every time you finish a stage, and the stage first, third and fourth will get extra lives every fifty miles.You get five points and five hundred kilometer overcome by stage. If you can reach the goal you will get extra points five thousand more, and another two hundred points for every life you have left.You returns to re-live through the 80 with this classic vintage style arcade game.Tags: Turbo, Coleco, Activision, Atari, Sega, Nintendo, Races, Race, Car, Cars, Road, Motor, Ferrari, Porsche, Coches, F1.

reviews.title: Feo

reviews.comment: Was ok. Nothing turbo about it.
